ygData.subject: Re: Plane of Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes but a lot of the no drop items or even the items you don t want to lose that are no drop are going to be needed in PoF. Naeeldar ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Yes but a lot of the no drop items or even the items you don't want to lose
that are no drop are going to be needed in PoF.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... <jhenders@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, September 13, 1999 9:26 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Plane of Fear


>From: jhenders@...
>
>On Mon, Sep 13/99, Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>> Well when you have a very good chanch of losing all your hard earned
>> equipment then you probably will be afraid to go there. Especially for
items
>> that may have took forever for you to camp like jboots.
>
>There's a sneaky way to avoid this that people have used. just duel
>someone and leave your no drop items on your corpse after getting res'd
>before going to fear. Doesn't matter much with the current fear nerfs
>but will probably be a good idea for testing out their upcoming "fixes".
>
>
